events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under refund due to customer's request for money back after receiving incorrect product.
An agent specialized in refund cases has been assigned to handle this issue to ensure prompt assistance.
Hello! I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and details about the item received?
To process the refund quickly, may I also have a photo of the incorrect item you received along with the packaging?
Order number 45321XYZ. I received a blue sweater instead of the red one I ordered. Attached is a photo of the wrong item and packaging.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method. You can keep the incorrect item or send it back with no extra charges.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund option. I appreciate being able to keep the wrong item without hassle.
Refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Closing this case as resolved since the refund has been received and no further issues were reported by the customer.
